column4: can anyone here recommend a good vnc client w/o the stupid connection gui?
anything better? vncviewer always seems slow
Hm well I'm not into vnc... I mostly just use TeamViewer
Mate is a gnome2 fork started by the ArchLinux team. Basically identical to gnome2. Cinnamon is a GNOME3 fork by the LinuxMint team. Made to make gnome3 friendlier.
Appears to be impossible. Either use Chromium or Oracle Java.
Huh. Then it's supposed to work just fine, just do a "sudo apt-get install icedtea-{6,7}-plugin"
yeah.. thats what i figured.. its a no go.. i see icedtea erros in chrome stdout/err. both 6 and 7 do the same
